In this mystery thriller full of action, the Oscar winner Denzel Washington stars as Whip Whitaker, an experienced airline pilot who miraculously lands his plane after a mid-air disaster, rescuing almost all passengers on board. After the accident, Whip is considered a hero, however, insofar as more facts become known, more questions than answers arise about who or what was really wrong and what actually happened on that plane.
